messages.text: You have entered a large amount in total Gift Aid payments. Please check.
Total amount of one-off Gift Aid payments cannot exceed the total gift aid payments. Please check.
Gift aid payments made this year treated as paid in the previous year cannot exceed the total gift aid payments. Please check.

Value of qualifying investments gifted to non-UK charities cannot exceed the sum of 'Value of qualifying shares and securities gifted to charity' and 'Value of qualifying land and buildings gifted to charity'. Please check.
Gift aid payments to non-UK charities cannot exceed the total gift aid payments. Please check.
